name: PAT_ENC_FOLLOW_UPS
description: This table contains the data for the follow up appointments requested by a provider at each encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DISPOSITION
columns.description: This the sentence form of the follow-up disposition.

columns.name: NUM_OF_UNITS
columns.description: This item contains the number of the given units (days/months/etc) into the future to schedule the follow-up.

columns.name: UNIT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the unit of measure used to determine how far into the future to schedule a follow-up appointment

columns.name: FREE_TEXT
columns.description: This is the note that is sent along with the follow-up request to the scheduler.

columns.name: PRN_USED_YN_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether PRN is used on a follow-up appointment.

columns.name: APPROX_USED_YN_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the date of a follow-up was approximate.

columns.name: PRN_TEXT
columns.description: This is the text that indicates why the follow-up is PRN.

columns.name: DISP_DATE
columns.description: This is the date the follow-up should be scheduled for.

columns.name: DISP_ID
columns.description: This is a unique identifier for each follow-up.
